articles.description: Apple AirPods Pro are also one of the most reliable earbuds available in the market and many popular celebrities can be seen using them. Launched at Rs 26,900 last year, Apple AirPods are currently available at Rs 790 in Flipkart sale after Rs 21,200 off.
